Text:
You doll!!! Thank you so much!!! :-)

is it too much to ask for Nov and Dec too? *blushing* I really appreciate this and hope it wasn't a huge inconvenience.
And I promise to seed it for a while in case anyone else is looking for it. Thank you soooo much!
Oops... I forgot October somehow. I have most of B&B for that year except those last four months. I really like the story with Bill and Katey. Glad to see they're still together now.
ClaudiaZ... would it be to much to ask if you could upload 2009 YR episodes that you have? I thank you in advance for any assistance!
